data.title: Fundamentals Foundation Certification 2201 Exam???
data.meta_description: Solved: Will this help me pass the Foundations 2201 exam? Or is it a waste of time and money? Thank you so much for your help!
data.text:
Will this help me pass the Foundations 2201 exam? Or is it a waste of time and money?

Thank you so much for your help!

https://certsarea.com/product/dumps-gis-fundamentals-foundation-2201/

Too costly.

1. The above mentioned resource isn't one of the resources mentioned by Esri

Ref: EGFF2201v3.20220411.pdf (esri.com)

In fact, Esri recommends a Learning Plan, i.e., Esri GIS Fundamentals Foundation Certification 2201 | Learning Plan.

2. Also just completing a question book doesn't guarantee clearing the exam. Rather you should focus on covering the topics under Skills Measured in the Exam Information Guide.

The concepts should be very basic for this certification exam. If you are comfortable with the workflows of ArcGIS Pro and ArcGIS Online, you should be able to clear the certification.

*Just a note: you need to pass in all the 04 individual modules of the exam, in order to pass the overall exam.

Had it been my choice to make, I wouldn't have spent so much on a Question book/ dump. Rather, use that sum (or less) to purchase an ArcGIS for Personal Use, which includes

ArcGIS Desktop Advanced (ArcGIS Pro and ArcMap) - 1 year subscrription

The most popular ArcGIS Desktop extensions

ArcGIS Desktop software updates

GIS Professional Advanced user type

100 credits for data storage, premium data access, and geocoding and analysis

A suite of ready-to-use apps for use anywhere, on any device

Access to maps and data on thousands of topics in ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, including foundation content from Esri

Installation support

Unlimited access to self-paced e-Learning on the Esri Training website

More Reference: Esri Documentation | Up-to-date documentation for ArcGIS and more | ArcGIS

Think Location
